title: Polki and Pearl Chandbali Earrings - Navarathna Sobha
materials: Seed Pearls. Features traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: Classic Chandbali design with a floral motif composed of meticulously set Polki diamonds. The earrings showcase a traditional design with three pearl drops suspended from delicate seed pearl clusters. The lotus-inspired setting enhances the Polki's natural brilliance, reflecting traditional Telugu artistry.
occasions: and elegant evening events. Perfect for Muhurtham or Sangeeth ceremonies.
description: A timeless heirloom piece, handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The combination of Polki diamonds and pearls reflects South Indian heritage and sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. A perfect blend of tradition and elegance, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
